pkgmetadata.longdescription: Processing and Analyzing of Diagnostics Trials // Provides methods and functions to analyze the quantitative or qualitative performance for diagnostic assays, and outliers detection, reader precision and reference range are discussed. Most of the methods and algorithms refer to CLSI (Clinical Laboratory Standards Institute) recommendations and NMPA (National Medical Products Administration) guidelines. In additional, relevant plots are constructed by 'ggplot2'.
